abstract: Pundits react to the release of the Baucus health care reform bill.
snippet: Pundits react to the release of the Baucus health care reform bill.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:12 p.m. After months of back and forth with leaders from both major political parties, Senator Max Baucus, the chairman of the Senate Finance Committee, released a health care reform proposal on Wednesday that meets many of the requirements that President Obama stipulated in a recent speech to lawmakers. Here is how a number of pundits reacted:

headline.main: Health Care Roundup: The Baucus Plan
